originalText.text: Linhart Dentistry is amazing — so caring, friendly, thorough, and they do excellent work. Angela Won is my hygienist, and she's meticulous. I always leave feeling like my teeth have never been cleaner! A big thanks also to Dr. Zach Linhart and the lovely support staff. All are terrific.

text.text: Linhart Dentistry is amazing — so caring, friendly, thorough, and they do excellent work. Angela Won is my hygienist, and she's meticulous. I always leave feeling like my teeth have never been cleaner! A big thanks also to Dr. Zach Linhart and the lovely support staff. All are terrific.

originalText.text:
Dr. Kunnan is an amazing provider. She is knowledgeable and is kind and takes the time to answer your questions. I trust her with my teeth.

Dr. Chan is also my favorite. She helps you feel as ease and doesn’t dismiss any of your worries, trivial as they may seem, and takes the time to educate you to ease your worries.

Even beyond them, the whole team at Linhart is so professional, talented, welcoming and kind. I always look forward to my appointments.

text.text:

Dr. Chan is also my favorite. She helps you feel as ease and doesn’t dismiss any of your worries, trivial as they may seem, and takes the time to educate you to ease your worries.

Even beyond them, the whole team at Linhart is so professional, talented, welcoming and kind. I always look forward to my appointments.

originalText.text: The best care and service! Marie is an extremely competent and professional hygienist who I look forward to seeing three times a year! Thanks to Dr Zach and Dr Linhart Sr for keeping my smile healthy and looking it’s best. And thanks to Melanie for her warmth, assistance and always pleasant personality. Highly recommend this practice!

text.text: The best care and service! Marie is an extremely competent and professional hygienist who I look forward to seeing three times a year! Thanks to Dr Zach and Dr Linhart Sr for keeping my smile healthy and looking it’s best. And thanks to Melanie for her warmth, assistance and always pleasant personality. Highly recommend this practice!

originalText.text: This office is the Disney of Dentistry. By that I mean the service, staff, and experience is extremely top of the line. You just want to stay forever! Dr. Kunen and Dina spent so much time with me making sure I understood the entirety of the treatment. The technicians who assisted were amazing as well!

text.text: This office is the Disney of Dentistry. By that I mean the service, staff, and experience is extremely top of the line. You just want to stay forever! Dr. Kunen and Dina spent so much time with me making sure I understood the entirety of the treatment. The technicians who assisted were amazing as well!

originalText.text: This is by far the best dentistry office EVER! They are so kind and attentive from the moment you arrive to the last second before you are out the door. Emergency visits...no problem as they can always accommodate. I feel blessed to be a patient at Linhart  Dentistry. Thank you for your never ending care!
